example: I've finished my homework for today.
She has completed the course this week.
We have finished the project on time.
I have written the report and sent it.

en: She has just returned from the trip.
example: She has just returned from the trip.
We have closed the shop for the day.
He has completed the test early.

en: They have moved to a new city.

example: I have packed my bag for the trip.
She has paid the bill online.

en: We have sold our old car.
example: We have sold our old car to a neighbor.

en: He has returned the library books.
example: He has returned the library books today.

en: They have found a new home.
example: They have found a new home in town.
I have fixed the computer; it works now.
